Title: Heaven Engine
Description: Realtime Rendering Engine. It's based upon .NET Framework and XNA/SlimDX.
HomeWiki:
Heaven Engine

Realtime rendering engine. It's based upon .NET Framework and XNA/SlimDX.

Applications

The technology has been integrated with an industrial application. It has been applied to render CAD-geometry and simulate/visualize process of measurement on coordinate measurement machine
